detail.title: Bomber Jacket
detail.description: Freshen up your winter wardrobe with this Jacket for Men from campus sutra. This Jacket is made of Quilted Nylon, the fabric of Jacket spells pure comfort and warmth. Fetch a casual and cool look for yourself by teaming it with a pair of jeans and sneakers.
detail.policy: If there is a size, colour or fit issue with your product, you can raise an exchange request within 30 days of receiving the product.
